Text: Thanx Judas for all your great work...really bro i am a big fan of yours dont let any troller fell you other way..waiting for M.I 4 imax version and predator.

i've nearly 140 movies already encoded that haven't been uploaded that only need to have the subtitles OCRed and cleaned up.

this shows how backlogged i am.

I've actually started ripping some of the older James Bonds Films... even with 24TB of storage.... all the demuxing and such without deleting sure chews all of it up quick.

I definitely appreciate your hard work! It's great to have good, but compact copies of these movies with subs in full HD! I've been able to replace lots of larger but lower-quality rips in my iTunes library with your uploads. Keep up the good work! :)
